import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Badge, Dropdown, Form, InputGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaShoppingCart, FaUser, FaSearch, FaBars, FaHeart, FaBell } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Header = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [cartCount] = useState(3); // Mock cart count const [wishlistCount] = useState(5); // Mock wishlist count const [isAuthenticated] = useState(true); // Mock auth state const [user] = useState({ firstName: 'Nguyễn Văn A', avatar: 'https://via.placeholder.com/30x30/6366f1/ffffff?text=A' }); // Mock user const handleSearch = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchQuery.trim()) { navigate(`/books?q=${encodeURIComponent(searchQuery.trim())}`); } }; const handleLogout = async () => { // Mock logout localStorage.removeItem('user'); navigate('/'); }; return ( {/* Brand */}
📚 BookStore Premium
{/* Main Navigation */}
🏠 Trang chủ 📖 Sách 📚 Danh mục ℹ️ Giới thiệu
{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="search-input" />
{/* Right Side Actions */}
{/* Wishlist */}
{wishlistCount > 0 && ( {wishlistCount} )}
Yêu thích {/* Cart */}
{cartCount > 0 && ( {cartCount} )}
Giỏ hàng {/* Notifications */}
2
Thông báo {/* User Menu */} {isAuthenticated ? (
{user.firstName} Thành viên VIP
{user.firstName}
nguyenvana@email.com
Thông tin cá nhân 📦 Đơn hàng của tôi Danh sách yêu thích 🚪 Đăng xuất ) : (
)}
); }; export default Header;
